title: Guilty_Gear_Judgement_USA
description:
Guilty Gear Judgment, players will be able to experience the fast paced, adrenaline fused, arcade fighting of Guilty Gear X2 #Reload as well as delve into a new Guilty Gear gameplay experience -- a beat-em-up, side-scrolling, action mode featuring 20 Guilty Gear characters battling through 18 levels of story and brawling. In addition, both the 1-on-1 fighting tournament of #Reload and the adventure play of Judgment offer wireless multi-player connectivity for up to two players.

This edition is an upgraded version (featuring the new Boost Mode) of the PSP game released as Guilty Gear X2 #Reload i
